name: Gordul_Koga
content:
Gordul Koga was a male Aqualish thug that lived on Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War.
Koga worked as an enforcer for the criminal Farious Gletch in Bestine. In 1 ABY, Koga decided go into business for himself. But Gletch was displeased with Koga's decision and paid a spacer to hunt the Aqualish down and kill him.
